summary.description: > MEDIUM CONFIDENCE! | > CORRECT NAME OF TOOL COULD ALSO BE 'data computation', 'deep cascade model', 'deep-layered', 'Deep Cascade Model based Face Recognition' | When Deep-layered Learning Meets Small Data | Author : Lei Zhang, Ji Liu, Bob Zhang, David Zhang, and Ce Zhu | This package contains codes for the two submodels DCM(S) and DCM(N) | Published in IEEE Transactions on Image Processing
summary.name: DCM
